name: Classic Air Hockey
description:
Game features:
🔘 Hockey games, sport games and air hockey games genre;
🔘 No internet connection required to play - you can play offline;
🔘 Realistic physic and beautiful music;
🔘 Multiplayer — you can play in air hockey games with friends or AI or with different devices;
🔘 Simple and addicting for all age groups - for kids and adults;

How to play:
🔹 Get Two Player Games: Classic Air Hockey for free from Google Play.
🔹 Use your finger to move the hockey pad and hit the puck to score goals.
🔹 Enjoy the best air hockey and share to friends!
